title: See More Clearly With These Two Mental Models - Ep 155
itunes:title: See More Clearly With These Two Mental Models - Ep 155
description:
Vitaliy is a big fan of mental models. They allow someone to think through analogy, often folding complex concepts into simple ones and transporting them from one discipline to another. If you use them well, you'll often see what others don't.

Essay - Why Do I Write a 27-page Letter To Clients: https://contrarianedge.com/why-do-i-write-a-27-page-letter-to-clients/

Fall Letter link: https://contrarianedge.com/tag/fall-letter-2021/

You can read this article online here: https://contrarianedge.com/see-more-clearly-with-these-two-mental-models/
